Subsection.Text: Corruptly offers to vote for or against, or to refrain from voting for or against, any candidate in any election in return for pecuniary or other benefit; or
Accepts a pecuniary or other benefit in exchange for a promise to vote for or against, or to refrain from voting for or against, any candidate in any election,

SectionBody.Text: is guilty of a felony of the third degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082, s. 775.083, or s. 775.084.
